text: Kuma Yahudu suka ce: "Hannun Allah abin yi wa ƙuƙumi ne. " An sanya hannuwansu a cikin ƙuƙumi! Kuma an la'ane su saboda abin da suka faɗa. A'a, hannuwanSa biyu shimfiɗaɗɗu ne, Yana ciyarwa yadda Yake so. Kuma lalle ne abin da aka saukar zuwa gare ka yana ƙara wa masu yawa daga gare su, girman kai da kafirci. Kuma Mun jefa a tsakaninsu, ƙiyayya da ƙeta, zuwa Ranar ¡iyama, ko da yaushe suka hura wata wuta domin yaƙi, sai Allah Ya bice ta. Suna aiki a cikin ƙasa domin ɓarna, alhali kuwa Allah ba Ya son masu fasadi
